Container.Name: Onedrive

Config.Name: Configuration
Config.Description: Location of the container configuration folder. Create this folder before start the container for the first time! For example: /mnt/user/appdata/onedrive When syncing multiple accounts, for each account a separate docker install is needed with a (sub)folder for the configuration files, for example: /mnt/user/appdata/onedrive/userA

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Location of the container data folder, where your onedrive files are stored. Create this folder before start the container for the first time! For example: /mnt/user/onedrive When syncing multiple accounts, for each account a docker install is needed with a (sub)folder for the data files, for example: /mnt/user/onedrive/userA

Config.Name: UID
Config.Description: In the Unraid WebUI open the terminal and type ‘id username’ for every user with an onedrive account you want to install an Onedrive container for and write down the UID and GID for these users.

Config.Name: GID
Config.Description: In the Unraid WebUI open the terminal and type ‘id username’ for every user with an onedrive account you want to install an Onedrive container for and write down the UID and GID for these users.
